name: Easy Peasy Bolognese
description: Super simple vegan Bolognese is your new go-to for a dreamy, meaty pasta sauce, ideal for a quick school night dinner! This hearty sauce offers all the flavours and texture of beef—but without the meat. It got its Easy Peasy name because it’s loaded with pea protein. That’s right, this Bolognese is vegan. Make room for your new go-to pasta sauce. Customize your way with non-dairy or dairy options.

ingredients.name: plain non-dairy creamer or half and half cream (10%)

preparation:
1. In a large Multipurpose Pot, combine mix, crushed tomatoes, water, and creamer. 
  2. Cover; simmer on medium heat for 15 min, stirring occasionally. Sauce will thicken near the end of the cook time; stir often to prevent sticking. Season to taste. 
  3. To serve, divide pasta between 8 plates. Spoon sauce on top and add additional toppings, if desired.
